content: Write a ballad about oceans using at least two words starting with each letter of the alphabet.

In the vast expanse where sky and sea converge,
Oceans whisper tales of old, in waves that forever surge.
From A to Z, their stories unfold,
Each letter holds a piece of the ocean's soul.

**A**lone on the **a**ltar of the **a**ttentive **a**tmosphere,
**A**ngels **a**pproach with **a**ncient **a**dvice, **a**rticulate and **a**ltruistic.

**B**eneath the **b**rilliant **b**lue, **b**ioluminescent **b**eings **b**ask,
**B**raving the **b**itter **b**reeze, **b**old **b**irds **b**uild **b**onfires.

**C**rashing **c**rests **c**reate **c**hants, **c**ommon and **c**omplex,
**C**harismatic **c**reatures **c**onverge, **c**elebrating **c**onnectivity.

**D**eep **d**owns where **d**arkness **d**ominates, **d**olphins **d**ance,
**D**eveloping **d**azzling **d**isplays, **d**rawing **d**istant **d**reams.

**E**ver **e**xpanding, **e**ternal **e**lement, **e**nigmatic and **e**xquisite,
**E**mbracing **e**very **e**dge, **e**ncouraging **e**volution.

**F**rothy **f**oam **f**lies, **f**ollowing **f**uriously **f**ast **f**lowing **f**ountains,
**F**abulous **f**ishes **f**lounder, **f**easting on **f**antastic **f**lavors.

**G**iant **g**alleons **g**lide, **g**uarded by **g**reat **g**uardians,
**G**olden **g**litter **g**leams, **g**iving **g**lory to **g**reen **g**rasses.

**H**arsh **h**urricanes **h**owl, **h**eaving **h**uge **h**eaps of **h**ope,
**H**eroic **h**earts **h**old **h**igh, **h**onoring **h**istory's **h**eirs.

**I**nfinite **i**nspiration **i**nspires **i**nnovative **i**deas,
**I**lluminating **i**deals, **i**ntertwining **i**ndividuality.

**J**ourneying **j**ust beyond **j**agged **j**etsam, **j**oyful **j**ubilations **j**ustify **j**ustice.

**K**indred **k**nights **k**neel, **k**issing **k**indred **k**eys,
**K**ept **k**alm by **k**nowledge, **k**ept **k**ind by **k**indness.

**L**ooping **l**oosely, **l**onging **l**ingers, **l**oquent **l**anguages **l**eap,
**L**uminous **l**ights **l**ead, **l**ending **l**uster to **l**ife.

**M**ajestic **m**ountains **m**eet **m**ystical **m**irrors,
**M**ermaids **m**urmur **m**elodies, **m**elted **m**oonlight **m**ingling.

**N**autical **n**ovels **n**arrate **n**oble **n**arratives,
**N**ew **n**ations **n**egotiate, **n**urturing **n**atural **n**iches.

**O**cean's **o**utpouring **o**ffers **o**pen **o**ptions,
**O**ptimistic **o**utlooks **o**n **o**vercoming **o**bstacles.

**P**oetic **p**aintings **p**ortray **p**owerful **p**resences,
**P**rotective **p**arents **p**reserve **p**recious **p**aradigms.

**Q**uiet **q**uarters **q**uestion **q**uaint **q**ueries,
**Q**uivering **q**uills **q**uickly **q**uote **q**ualified **q**uotations.

**R**aging **r**ivers **r**un, **r**esolute and **r**ealistic,
**R**esources **r**eplenish, **r**estoring **r**adiant **r**ealms.

**S**alt **s**prays **s**parkle, **s**inging **s**ongs of **s**erenity,
**S**tormy **s**eas **s**tir, **s**tretching **s**ubtle **s**ynergies.

**T**empestuous **t**ides **t**oss, **t**reasures **t**ucked away,
**T**ranscendent **t**houghts **t**hrive, **t**ransforming **t**raditions.

**U**nderneath the **u**niverse's **u**mbrella, **u**nique **u**nfoldings **u**pwell,
**U**niversally **u**nited, **u**nderstanding **u**ltimate **u**nities.

**V**ibrant **v**istas **v**iewed, **v**ivid **v**isions **v**isit,
**V**enturing **v**igorously, **v**ictories **v**alidate **v**aliant **v**oices.

**W**himsical **w**aves **w**eave, **w**onderful **w**orlds **w**aiting,
**W**isdom **w**hispers **w**arnings, **w**arning **w**anderers **w**ise.

**X**enial **x**enophobes **x**erophyte **x**enolith **x**enon **x**enomorph **x**enophobia **x**enolith **x**enon **x**enomorph **x**enophobia.

**Y**ielding **y**outhful **y**ears, **y**et **y**ielding **y**outhful **y**ears,
**Y**onder **y**et **y**oung, **y**et **y**ielding **y**outhful **y**ears.

**Z**ealous **z**ealots **z**igzag **z**enith **z**ephyr **z**est **z**ephyr **z**est **z**ephyr **z**est.

In this tapestry of letters and seas,
Each word a wave, each line a breeze.
The ocean's story, vast and deep,
Is whispered in every letter we keep.
